Package com.fortisbank.business.services.transaction

Interface ITransactionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TransactionService
public interface ITransactionService
Interface for transaction-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • createTransaction

      void createTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Creates a new transaction.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the transaction to be created

    • deleteTransaction

      void deleteTransaction(String transactionNumber)
      Deletes a transaction by its transaction number.
      Parameters:
      transactionNumber - the transaction number of the transaction to be deleted

    • getTransactionByNumber

      Transaction getTransactionByNumber(String transactionNumber)
      Retrieves a transaction by its transaction number.
      Parameters:
      transactionNumber - the transaction number of the transaction to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the transaction with the specified transaction number

    • getTransactionsByAccount

      TransactionList getTransactionsByAccount(String accountId)
      Retrieves all transactions for a specific account.
      Parameters:
      accountId - the ID of the account
      Returns:
      the list of transactions for the specified account

    • getAllTransactions

      TransactionList getAllTransactions()
      Retrieves all transactions.
      Returns:
      the list of all transactions

    • getTransactionsByCustomerAndDateRange

      TransactionList getTransactionsByCustomerAndDateRange(String customerID, LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Retrieves transactions for a specific customer within a date range.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer
      start - the start date of the range
      end - the end date of the range
      Returns:
      the list of transactions for the specified customer within the date range

    • getBalanceBeforeDate

      BigDecimal getBalanceBeforeDate(String customerID, LocalDate start)
      Retrieves the balance of a customer before a specific date.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer
      start - the date before which the balance is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the balance of the customer before the specified date
